plot: A young man whose soul returns to his homeland to settle unfinished businesses and to finally rest. It is based on the settlers belief that when a person dies his soul goes back to his homeland.
title: Ang tigmo sa aking pagpauli
plot_es: A young man whose soul returns to his homeland to settle unfinished businesses and to finally rest. It is based on the settlers belief that when a person dies his soul goes back to his homeland.
plot_en: A young man whose soul returns to his homeland to settle unfinished businesses and to finally rest. It is based on the settlers belief that when a person dies his soul goes back to his homeland.
